description:
Enjoy the best of both worlds with this rugged combo. The strong U-lock protects your frame and one wheel. The cable threads through your second wheel. Or it can be wrapped around a larger anchor for situations where the alternative would simply be “freelocking” your bike with the U-lock.

  • Shackle is 115 x 230mm
  • Cable is 120cm long, 10mm thick
  • Hardened 14mm steel shackle resists prying, jacking, or cutting
  • Rounded profile and smoothed edges minimize leverage points
  • Fully coated shackle and crossbar to protect your bike’s paint job
  • Rated 9/10 on Magnum’s security scale
name: Magnum 3003 U-Lock  & Cable
